translations: n.前奏，前言，导言；介绍；简介

phrs.translation: 序曲, 引子, 开场曲
网站简介, 取景, 外景介绍, 联系我们
古古惑惑, 历久常新, 久常新
服务报价, 场景介绍, 景点介绍, 场景先容
到……中, 进入, 人口, 向内
半个月亮爬上来, 半个月亮
序曲, 无底洞钢琴前奏, 无底洞, 蔡健雅

sentences.sentence: I could only take intro courses because there were no intermediate level courses available for those particular topics.
sentences.translation: 我只能选入门课程，因为这些特定主题没有中级课程可选。

sentences.sentence: The listening journal you assigned us to keep for the Intro to World Music class, I am not sure I understand what to do.
sentences.translation: 您在《世界音乐入门》课上让我们写一篇音乐报告，我并不确定自己该写些什么。

sentences.sentence: But in our intro class, you are reviewing the basics, like plots, setting and character and getting your first real exposure to different literary styles.
sentences.translation: 但在我们的入门课上，你会复习基础知识，比如情节、背景和人物，并会第一次真正接触不同的文学风格。
